settings.theme:
**Functional Purpose**: Title for the editor theme setting in the dropdown.
**UI Location**: Editor header → Settings dropdown → Theme section title
**When Users See This**: When the settings dropdown is opened.
**Technical Context**: Part of a radio button group. Previously 'Theme'.
**Current English**: "Theme"
settings.light:
**Functional Purpose**: Option label for the 'Light' editor theme.
**UI Location**: Editor header → Settings dropdown → Theme section → Light option
**When Users See This**: When the settings dropdown is opened.
**Technical Context**: Corresponds to `Themes.LIGHT`. Previously 'Light'.
**Current English**: "Light"
settings.dark:
**Functional Purpose**: Option label for the 'Dark' editor theme.
**UI Location**: Editor header → Settings dropdown → Theme section → Dark option
**When Users See This**: When the settings dropdown is opened.
**Technical Context**: Corresponds to `Themes.DARK`. Previously 'Dark'.
**Current English**: "Dark"
settings.keybindings:
**Functional Purpose**: Title for the editor keybindings setting in the dropdown.
**UI Location**: Editor header → Settings dropdown → Keybindings section title
**When Users See This**: When the settings dropdown is opened.
**Technical Context**: Part of a radio button group. Previously 'Keybindings'.
**Current English**: "Keybindings"
settings.wrap:
**Functional Purpose**: Title for the editor text wrap setting in the dropdown.
**UI Location**: Editor header → Settings dropdown → Wrap section title
**When Users See This**: When the settings dropdown is opened.
**Technical Context**: Part of a radio button group. Previously 'Wrap'.
**Current English**: "Wrap"
settings.on:
**Functional Purpose**: Option label for turning text wrapping 'On'.
**UI Location**: Editor header → Settings dropdown → Wrap section → On option
**When Users See This**: When the settings dropdown is opened.
**Technical Context**: Corresponds to `wrap: 'on'`. Previously 'On'.
**Current English**: "On"
settings.off:
**Functional Purpose**: Option label for turning text wrapping 'Off'.
**UI Location**: Editor header → Settings dropdown → Wrap section → Off option
**When Users See This**: When the settings dropdown is opened.
**Technical Context**: Corresponds to `wrap: 'off'`. Previously 'Off'.
**Current English**: "Off"
settings.tabMode:
**Functional Purpose**: Title for the editor tab mode setting in the dropdown.
**UI Location**: Editor header → Settings dropdown → Tab mode section title
**When Users See This**: When the settings dropdown is opened.
**Technical Context**: Part of a radio button group. Previously 'Tab mode'.
**Current English**: "Tab mode"
settings.editor:
**Functional Purpose**: Option label for 'Editor' tab mode, where tab is captured by the editor.
**UI Location**: Editor header → Settings dropdown → Tab mode section → Editor option
**When Users See This**: When the settings dropdown is opened.
**Technical Context**: Corresponds to `tabBehavior: 'captured'`. Previously 'Editor'.
**Current English**: "Editor"
settings.accessibility:
**Functional Purpose**: Option label for 'Accessibility' tab mode, where tab behaves normally for navigation.
**UI Location**: Editor header → Settings dropdown → Tab mode section → Accessibility option
**When Users See This**: When the settings dropdown is opened.
**Technical Context**: Corresponds to `tabBehavior: 'default'`. Previously 'Accessibility'.
**Current English**: "Accessibility"
